title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 701.1 - Creation and membership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 701.1 - Creation and membership

State Regulations

The Community Services Block Grant Advisory Council
(hereinafter Council), is hereby created in the Department of State. The

Council shall have twenty members, to include representatives from local
governments, private non-profit providers and the public. Ten members shall be
appointed by the Governor, five by the Temporary President of the Senate, and
five by the Speaker of the Assembly. Members shall serve at the pleasure of
their appointing authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
701.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
